stem: If someone completes 12 pages in 3 hours, how many in 14 hours?

If someone completes 40 widgets in 5 hours, how many in 14 hours?
If someone completes 18 songs in 2 hours, how many in 12 hours?
If someone completes 14 chapters in 2 hours, how many in 7 hours?
If someone completes 6 levels in 3 hours, how many in 15 hours?
If someone completes 48 rows in 6 hours, how many in 15 hours?
If someone completes 8 tasks in 2 hours, how many in 11 hours?
If someone completes 16 orders in 4 hours, how many in 8 hours?
If someone completes 15 reports in 3 hours, how many in 9 hours?
If someone completes 8 paintings in 4 hours, how many in 8 hours?
If someone completes 60 sketches in 6 hours, how many in 10 hours?

If someone completes 20 models in 2 hours, how many in 13 hours?
